variable.name: bdiage
variable.description: Age at baseline BDI (Beck Depression Inventory)

variable.name: bdigender
variable.value: Female
Male

variable.name: bdidays
variable.description: Time since last BDI (Beck Depression Inventory)

variable.name: bdi1
variable.value: I do not feel sad
I feel sad much of the time
I am sad all the time
I am so sad or unhappy that I can't stand it
Not Applicable
Unavailable

variable.name: bdi2
variable.value: I am not discouraged by my future
I feel more discouraged about my future than I used to be
I do not expect things to work out for me
I feel my future is hopeless and will only get worse
Not Applicable
Unavailable

variable.name: bdi3
variable.value: I do not feel like a failure
I've failed more than I should have
As I look back, I see a lot of failures
I feel I am a total failure as a person

Unavailable

Unavailable

Unavailable

Unavailable
